Title: Can't Fix Crazy
Plot: Red's scheme to reclaim her kitchen backfires; the inmates stage a Christmas pageant; Piper's plans unravel even as she realizes her life is in jeopardy.
GuestStars: Danielle Brooks, Laverne Cox, Catherine Curtin, Joel Marsh Garland, Annie Golden, Lauren Lapkus, Taryn Manning, Matt McGorry, Matt Peters, Dascha Polanco, Elizabeth Rodriguez, Nick Sandow, Todd Susman, Samira Wil
